reviews.text: It's too bad you haven't written a flavour profile, so it's hard to guess, but it's a very nice recipe. I've toned down that super sweet tho, but compared to for example honeydewwy from Wayne, it's a bit thicker, a bit more leaning on the cream. Very good though!
I am new to mixing. I would love to have a cantaloupe ice cream. I only have tfa honey dew v2. Would you even use v2? I ordered it on accident.
